short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a musician-friendly controller to videos on YouTube.com making it easy to set loops and slow down. Built by MusicLessons.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a musician-friendly video controller directly underneath YouTube videos on YouTube.com. The controller makes it easier to work with YouTube videos as a musician, letting you set loops and slow down videos so you can practice more efficiently.
